entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
